name: Introduction to Classics
description: Provides an overview of the field of Classics and its primary works and authors.

name: Classical Greek and Roman History
description: Explores the history, culture, and literature of the ancient Greeks and Romans.

name: Classical Mythology
description: Introduces students to classical myth and its importance in the development of Greco-Roman culture.

name: Classical Latin
description: Introduces students to the Latin language, including basic grammar, syntax, and vocabulary.

name: Classical Greek
description: Introduces students to the Greek language, including basic grammar, syntax, and vocabulary.

name: Advanced Latin and Greek
description: Provides more comprehensive study of the Latin and Greek languages, including more complex grammar, syntax, and vocabulary.

name: Classical Art and Architecture
description: Explores the art and architecture of the ancient Greeks and Romans.

name: Classical Philosophy
description: Introduces students to the philosophy of the ancient Greeks and Romans.

name: Advanced Classics Education
description: Provides more comprehensive study of the field of Classics, including a deeper exploration of the history, culture, literature, philosophy, and art of the ancient Greeks and Romans.
